headline.main: Finding the Patient in a Sea of Guidelines

docs.abstract: A more personalized approach to doctor’s clinical guidelines can improve patient care while saving money.
docs.lead_paragraph: Every Friday morning, the patient, a homeless man in his 60s, lumbered into one of our exam rooms, slipped off the running shoes he wore like bedroom slippers and gingerly lifted his swollen legs so we could remove the medicated bandages and examine the raw wounds on his inner ankles.
docs.snippet: A more personalized approach to doctor’s clinical guidelines can improve patient care while saving money.

headline.seo: Does Late-Night Eating Cause Weight Gain?
headline.print_headline: THE CLAIM: Eating Late at Night Causes Weight Gain
headline.main: Does Late-Night Eating Cause Weight Gain?

docs.lead_paragraph: A link between late-night eating and weight gain has been debated for years.
docs.snippet: A link between late-night eating and weight gain has been debated for years.

headline.main: Mapping Happiness: Analyzing an Interactive About a Nation's Well-Being

byline.original: By ANNISSA HAMBOUZ and KATHERINE SCHULTEN

docs.abstract: We're experimenting with multimedia again this week by presenting questions and inquiry activities around an interactive map showing Americans' responses to questions about quality of life by Congressional district.
docs.snippet: We're experimenting with multimedia again this week by presenting questions and inquiry activities around an interactive map showing Americans' responses to questions about quality of life by Congressional district.
